name: [NEW UPDATE] A 2D Space Sim Game
description:
This is a game that StudioSoft is currently working on (a tiny indie studio comprised of me and Sylman). You make, you break, all in Space. There isn't much now and as a result the 1st weekly build is nothing more than a **tech demo**, so don't expect a complete game.

There will be lots of stuff by the 1.0 release, including space trading stations, pirates, infinite worlds with procedural asteroids and did somebody say planets? Whoever that was we're not sure if they're right or not but we'll just have to wait and see ;)

StudioSoft discord! Join to chill or to ask questions or to anything really!
